post.author: Krublokk
post.body:
Hello

Got some questions. I was wondering if someone could make the helmeted Medic and Techmarine playable in multi-play. Is such a thing possible?

Also how about your hands holding the gun? I mean, I would like to see the yellow brightskin grabbing the nailgun when I choose to be Pro Strogg! Could that be done? Thanks in advance!
